description: Structured information describing how two anatomical entities (terms) related to each other.

anatomicalEntityObject.description: The object that relates to/is compared to the subject.

anatomicalEntitySubject.description: The subject to which the object relates to/is compared to.

confidence.description: Semantic description for the confidence of the relation between subject and object.

percentalOverlap.description: The overlap between object and subject expressed in percentage.

relationType.description: Type of relation between subject and object (semantic description).
